maxEntries.title: Maximum json object entries
maxEntries.description: Maximum number of entries allowed in an json object. Example: { "a":{ "b":1, "c":2, "d":3 }}, "a" has 3 entries

maxArraySize.title: Maximum json array size
maxArraySize.description: Maximum number of elements allowed in an array.

maxDepth.title: Maximum json depth
maxDepth.description: Maximum depth of json structure. Example: { "a":{ "b":{ "c":true }}}, json has a depth of 3.

maxNameLength.title: Maximum json field name length
maxNameLength.description: Maximum string length allowed for a json property name.

maxValueLength.title: Maximum json field value length
maxValueLength.description: Maximum string length allowed for a json property value.
